title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual's entitlement to any benefit thereunder shall continue through the month of his or her death (without affecting any other person's entitlement to benefits for that month) and that such individual's benefit shall be payable for such month only to the extent proportionate to the number of days in such month preceding the date of such individual's death.
content: Proportionate Final Benefit Act of 2005 - Amends title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to provide that: (1) an individual's entitlement to any OASDI benefit shall continue through the month of his or her death. And (2) the benefit shall be payable for such month only to the extent proportionate to the number of days in the month preceding the date of death.
